summary: Ironstrange Kisses #41 - Because of Reading Glasses
title: Ironstrange Kisses #41 - Because of Reading Glasses
body:
Stephen’s eyes are fine. He will insist to anyone who asks him that he does not need reading glasses of all things. He absolutely shudders at the thought of it. Yet, he cannot help squint as he looks at the ancient tome in his lap. He grumbles and growls and finally admits that yes, the fine print is hard to read - damn it all to the deepest layer of hell.

It’s a natural effect of aging. He’s not a kid anymore, having crept close to the middle age without noticing it. He could probably do something about it magically, but that’d be an act of vanity and he does try to avoid those.

So, he gets reading glasses. It’s not a big deal, and the tiny little piece of glass and plastic does make a difference.

He is sitting in the living room, a fire blazing in the fireplace in front of him. He looks down at the book in hand, tired, but trying to finish his studies for the day. He does not notice his beautiful husband as the man creeps into the room and comes up behind him, wrapping an arm around his shoulder as he side steps onto the couch, sitting next to Stephen.

“Hey babe - woah…”

Tony trails off and Stephen then realizes he’s been caught with the damned things on.

“What?” he asks.

“You wear glasses now?” Tony asks. His mouth hangs open. “That’s…”

“I know, it looks ridiculous, right?” Stephen says, laughing and trying to play it off. “It’s just the print in these books is idiotically small.”

“Babe, that is the hottest thing I’ve ever seen.”

Tony’s kiss proves that he’s not just saying things and Stephen sees that there is a clear benefit to his wearing reading glasses.

summary:
a Pregnant Pepper Potts arriving at an event and stopping for pictures
and the camera man like “here she comes, pepper potts...
body:
a Pregnant Pepper Potts arriving at an event and stopping for pictures

and the camera man like “here she comes, pepper potts with a now big baby bump showing…” but he doesn’t get to finish because tony steps in front of the camera

“HEY I MADE THAT”

then proudly goes after pepper who’s lightly smacking him on his way too expensive tux.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: All Your Broken Pieces - Steve’s Abstract Realism & Platonic Love
title: All Your Broken Pieces - Steve’s Abstract Realism & Platonic Love
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Q3ivGz

by lokivsanubis

Steve had a rough start in life, a large heart, a small chest, a death sentence a week into existence and yet he had overcome. He had a knack for caring for others, a quick temper and a  strategic mind. He promised his mother when he went off to war, chasing his best friend, “I won’t come home to you in a box, Ma.” And yet here he was running headlong to return an active grenade to an insurgent stronghold and volunteering for suicide missions trying to find aforementioned best friend or what had happened to him.

Words: 4348, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of All Your Broken Pieces - Stuckony Parts of the Raising Peter Parker Series, Part 5 of Peter Parker & His 3 Dads - Raising Peter Parker Series

  • Fandoms: Captain America - All Media Types, Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Sarah Rogers, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Brock Rumlow, Clint Barton, James “Bucky” Barnes, Rebecca Barnes Proctor, Tony Stark, Peter Parker, Mary Parker, Richard Parker
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes & Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Implied/Referenced Suicide, Implied/Referenced Torture, Aftermath of Torture, Friends to Lovers, Parenthood, Painting, Body Paint, kinda it’s cute, Alternate Universe - Domestic, Implied/Referenced Domestic Violence, Sexual Content, Masturbation in Bathroom, Bucky Barnes’s Metal Arm, Bucky Barnes Needs a Hug, Everyone Needs A Hug, Post-Serum Steve Rogers, Protective Steve Rogers, Accidental Voyeurism, Falling In Love


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Q3ivGz

blog.name: larissaloki
blog.title: Larisaloki
blog.description: 24 year old grey-ace Pansexual Lover of all things marvel especially Tony Stark, Black Widow, Loki, black panther, James Barnes and Thor. my a03 is called larissaloki! Also anything cute, Nsfw and sfw stuff is posted here.

summary: 1,Wud you rather be a vampire or a werewolf?  2, Fly or be super Strong?  3,Be able to do maths quick or draw(if you can't do...
question: 1,Wud you rather be a vampire or a werewolf?  2, Fly or be super Strong?  3,Be able to do maths quick or draw(if you can't do either already)?  4, Be rich or super smart?  5, Live forever or have the power to give others immortality?  6, Which film/fandon/book would you like to live through as the protagonist? 7, Which film/fandon/book would you like to live through as the villain 8, How do you think cap Wud have liked the song mambo no 5?  9, Fave ever trope?  You don't have to answer these btw
answer:
1,Wud you rather be a vampire or a werewolf?

Oooh tough call… depeding on the werewolf troupe you’regoing with, a few years back os say vampire no questions asked but im now torn! If i had to choose id say vampire, you’re meant to be automatically beautiful right?

2, Fly or be super Strong?

Fly, id get away from all my problems by flying off to places unknown and secluded to holiday to!

3,Be able to do maths quick or draw(if you can’t do either already)?

Drawing, i love it and when i have ghe muse for it, very relaxing!

4, Be rich or super smart?

Smart? Id go on quiz shows and just win loads of money that way and be a internet marvel

5, Live forever or have the power to give others immortality?

Neithet, eternity alone seems lonely and heartbreaking

6, Which film/fandon/book would you like to live through as the protagonist?

Oooh again a tough call… id say… anita blake vampire executioner series, dont let the title fool you shes actually pretty friendly with vamps and all other manner of supernatural life! At least her life is never boring!

7, Which film/fandon/book would you like to live through as the villain

Marvel if i get to choose to be loki

8, How do you think cap Wud have liked the song mambo no 5?

He’d love it and have it as his phone ting tone!

9, Fave ever trope?

A/b/o and i love the whole fake relationship thing so hilarious yet tragic!

Oooh again a tough call… id say… anita blake vampire executioner series, dont let the title fool you shes actually pretty friendly with vamps and all other manner of supernatural life! At least her life is never boring!

7, Which film/fandon/book would you like to live through as the villain

Marvel if i get to choose to be loki

8, How do you think cap Wud have liked the song mambo no 5?

He’d love it and have it as his phone ting tone!

9, Fave ever trope?

A/b/o and i love the whole fake relationship thing so hilarious yet tragic!

Oooh tough call… depeding on the werewolf troupe you’regoing with, a few years back os say vampire no questions asked but im now torn! If i had to choose id say vampire, you’re meant to be automatically beautiful right?

2, Fly or be super Strong?

Fly, id get away from all my problems by flying off to places unknown and secluded to holiday to!

3,Be able to do maths quick or draw(if you can’t do either already)?

Drawing, i love it and when i have ghe muse for it, very relaxing!

4, Be rich or super smart?

Smart? Id go on quiz shows and just win loads of money that way and be a internet marvel

5, Live forever or have the power to give others immortality?

Neithet, eternity alone seems lonely and heartbreaking

6, Which film/fandon/book would you like to live through as the protagonist?

Oooh again a tough call… id say… anita blake vampire executioner series, dont let the title fool you shes actually pretty friendly with vamps and all other manner of supernatural life! At least her life is never boring!

Marvel if i get to choose to be loki

A/b/o and i love the whole fake relationship thing so hilarious yet tragic!

tags: i filled one ask out of a billion
summary: Blue (Bucky/Tony)
title: Blue (Bucky/Tony)
body:
Bucky couldn’t take his eyes off Tony. He was just so beautiful. Tony’s wings were a colour unlike most others; a brilliant blue, so vibrant and so bold. It was a bright shade, more striking than the sky and more alluring than the sea.

Bucky had spent years surrounded by boring colours, dull shades of greys and blacks. They weren’t awful colours by any means, but they were repetitive and worn by so many people. After a while, they just blurred into one and Bucky stopped noticing them.

His own wings were black. They had once been a bold black, almost a deep navy blue in certain lights, but now they were charred and burnt from years of torture and abuse. When Bucky had finally gotten out of HYDRA’s clutches, he had longed to see colour. Actual real colours that differed dramatically to whatever shade had come before it. Something with a little variety, a little unique spin.

And Tony’s wings had that.

“Are you staring at me again?”

Bucky smiled and lifted his hand to swipe Tony’s hair back from his forehead, meeting Tony’s eyes as his words rolled off his tongue. “Of course.”

Tony turned his head to bury his smile into his pillow. He said something, but Bucky’s focus wandered over to Tony’s wings once more. In the watery sunshine of the early morning, they were almost radiant. Bucky couldn’t remember ever seeing someone’s wings shining like Tony’s did. There was a gentle glow to them, the blue so bright and so enticing.

Bucky startled when Tony laughed. “You weren’t listening to me at all, were you?”

Bucky grimaced a little, but he couldn’t deny how utterly fascinated he was, nor fool Tony. “Sorry,” he said instead.

“No, you’re not.”

Bucky lowered his hand and finally gave into the urge to run his fingers over the silky-soft feathers. “No,” he whispered, leaning close to brush his lips over Tony’s. “I’m not.”

blog.name: textsfromthe-avengers
blog.title: Texts From The Avengers
blog.description:
There was an idea called the Avengers Initiative. The idea was to bring together a group of remarkable people, see if they could become something more. see if they could work together when we needed them to and fight the battles that we never could.
Unfortunately, this is not that idea. Welcome to Texts from The Avengers. Leave Natasha's tequila where you found it, ignore Tony's drinking problem, and for the love of God, don't walk in on Thor at 3 AM. Enjoy.
PLEASE READ THE FAQ!!!

THE TIP JAR

summary: In the end of Avengers 4 everyone of the six first Avengers stay alive and decide - to protect our universe - that each of them...
body:
In the end of Avengers 4 everyone of the six first Avengers stay alive and decide - to protect our universe - that each of them takes one infinity stone with them in five other parallel universes to keep them safe.

Steve will get a chance to dance with Peggy cause the war is over.

Thor can rebuild Asgard.

Bruce invests in more science and finds a remedy for cancer.

Clint lives happily with his wife and kids.

Tony marries Pepper and they get a child.

Natasha finds a way for young girls to be able to choose their own ways in life.
